alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 17 at 11:59AM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snow melt and reservoir releases will cause the river flows to remain high. Expect minor flooding to continue downstream from the dam. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and will continue. * WHERE...East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.8 feet, Minor flooding in reach. East Walker Road and other low rural roads likely closed at lowest points. At 9.5 feet, Moderate flooding in reach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM PDT Saturday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM PDT Saturday was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady and near 9.4 feet through Saturday. - Action stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: East Walker Road remains closed, use caution near river banks, prolonged high flows may lead to bank instability. There may also be debris within the river channel. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Sunday.
